game.name: ShootOut
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ShootOut is a first-person competitive target shooter. Fight for a top spot on the Leaderboards in over 30 levels, with six different guns to unlock, customize, and master.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ShootOut is a first-person competitive target shooter. Fight for a top spot on the Leaderboards in over 30 levels, with six different guns to unlock, customize, and master.
